thread.title: Fire tears through UWS apartment, killing 87-year-old woman - NY Daily News
thread.title_full: Fire tears through UWS apartment, killing 87-year-old woman - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Fire tears through UWS apartment, killing 87-year-old woman - NY Daily News
text:
An 87-year-old woman died after a fire tore through an Upper West Side apartment early Thursday, police said.
The blaze broke out around 1:15 a.m. in a fifth floor apartment of the 11-story Phelps House, an affordable housing building for the elderly on Columbus Ave., an FDNY spokesman said.
Firefighters responded to battle the blaze, which they had under control by 2 a.m., officials said.
The blaze broke out on the fifth floor early Thursday, and firefighters had control of the flames by 2 a.m. (Vic Nicastro for New York Daily News) The victim, whose name has not been released, was found dead inside the apartment, cops said.
Four firefighters were injured bringing the fire under control, according to the spokesman. They were taken to St. Lukeâ€™s with minor injuries.
